thread.section_title: SkyLux Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SkyLux Travel | www.skyluxtravel.com
thread.title: Ashleigh D.
thread.title_full: SkyLux Travel reviewed by Ashleigh D.

author: Ashleigh D.
title: Ashleigh D.
text:
I have now used SkyLux Travel twice, and I have recommended it to several people. The first time was a solo trip to Europe with flights to few cities, and this time it is a trip with my family with, once again, flights arriving to and leaving from different cities.
Ian gave us very good options, and he was very responsive to questions and concerns. I will continue to recommend SkyLux Travel to friends who are traveling abroad.
